values.ctor:
<init>(out: OutputStream!, def: Deflater!, size: Int, syncFlush: Boolean)
            Creates a new output stream with the specified compressor, buffer size and flush mode.

<init>(out: OutputStream!, def: Deflater!, size: Int)
            Creates a new output stream with the specified compressor and buffer size.

<init>(out: OutputStream!, def: Deflater!, syncFlush: Boolean)
            Creates a new output stream with the specified compressor, flush mode and a default buffer size.

<init>(out: OutputStream!, def: Deflater!)
            Creates a new output stream with the specified compressor and a default buffer size.

<init>(out: OutputStream!, syncFlush: Boolean)
            Creates a new output stream with a default compressor, a default buffer size and the specified flush mode.

<init>(out: OutputStream!)
            Creates a new output stream with a default compressor and buffer size.

values.desc: Writes remaining compressed data to the output stream and closes the underlying stream.
Finishes writing compressed data to the output stream without closing the underlying stream.
Writes a byte to the compressed output stream.

values.code: write(b: ByteArray!, off: Int, len: Int)
values.desc: Writes an array of bytes to the compressed output stream.
Writes next block of compressed data to the output stream.
